name: ReShoot
description:
Reshoot is a top-down space shooter in which your ship starts off strong, but gets weaker as time passes. The only way to recover your upgrades is by killing enemies and obtaining the fast-forward, which not only restores your upgrades, but can even increase your power and permanently unlock new abilities!

This game was made as part of theWeekly Jam 161

NOTE:

 My high score is 100,584. I challenge everyone to beat it.

Credits:

Programming and assets were all made by me.

Music and sound effects taken from the following sites:
